76a6('bum): pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dan/ 
76a7('bum): pa gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
76a8('bum): pa skyed pa la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mo myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mye
76b1('bum): dang / smon pa myed pas stong ste/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma
76b2('bum): lags/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid kyang
76b3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
76b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes ra
76b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'i stobs bcu la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin
76b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnamos kyis stong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
76b7('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa'
76b8('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams/ myi 'jigs pa rjes
77a1('bum): kyis stong ste/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / myi 'jigs pa rnams ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ myi 'jigs pa nas/ 
77a2('bum): kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs
77a3('bum): rnams la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag por rig pa bzhi la gnas
77a4('bum): par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di daltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong
77a5('bum): pa nyid gang lags bya de yang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na/ yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ so so yang dag par rig pa
77a6('bum): kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
77a7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byam so
77a8('bum): chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po ni/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos stong ste/ byams pa chen po/ 
77b1('bum): ji dag snying rje chen po yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po rje com ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rolal
77b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcwo mang ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
77b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gan sa par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams// sangs
77b4('bum): chos kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi tshe rdzas ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags/ sangs
77b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mi chos te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom
77b6('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres lnga rnams la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom
77b7('bum): ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yi ge rnams la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la gnas
78a1('bum): gapa kyi gyi gcig tu brjod pa la gnas par myi bgyi/ gnyis su brjod pa la gnas par bgyi// ba dang du brjod pa la gnas par myi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan las de nA~M
78a2('bum): 'di ltar yi ge rnams ni yi ge rnams kyis stong ste/ yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yi ge rnams ma lags yi ge rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma muchi ste twe/ mI hrI
78a3('bum): rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yi ge/ 
78a4('bum): rnams la la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes ra kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa
78a5('bum): rnams la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon pa shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams
78a6('bum): kyi stong gi dag sngags pa de yang mngon gas pa rnams sa la su/ mngon pa shes pa rnams sras bud na yang stong pa nyid su mchis te/ mngon pa shes pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ 
78a7('bum): nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das nam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i rje/ mngon par shes
78a8('bum): rnams la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la ga
78b1('bum): par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ting nge
78b2('bum): 'dzin gi sgo rnams ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin gi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan
78b3('bum): 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan
78b4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha/ rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo thas cad/ la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
78b5('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ gzungs gi sgo rnams gi stong pa nyid gang la gas pa de yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags/ gzungs
78b6('bum): kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnaMs kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs gi sgo sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' ses
78b7('bum): dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
78b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs myi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 
79a1('bum): gzugs myi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs myi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs myi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs myi rtag pa
79a2('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs myi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rgyu/ 
79a3('bum): gzugs myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
79a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyi da gang lags pa de yang tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid ma lags
79a5('bum): tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyi steng tshor ba myi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
79a6('bum): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba myi rtag gro zhes bi gya bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
79a7('bum): za la spyod pa'i tshi tu 'du shes myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes myi rtag pa nyid gyis stong ste/ 'du shes myi rtag pa
79a8('bum): nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes myi rtag pa nyid ma logs/ 'du shes myi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes myi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong
79b1('bum): nyid kyang 'du shes myi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes myi
79b2('bum): rtag go zhes bgyi blar gnas par myi bgyi'o// na/ bam po lnga pa'o// 
79b3('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
79b4('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed myi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ byed myi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed myi dag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed myi rtag pa/ 
79b5('bum): nyid gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed myi da/ pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed myi rtag pa nyid// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems
79b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// de sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa
79b7('bum): tshe/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dri ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa myi ga
79b8('bum): pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid g.yo lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa ma legs/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te// rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid
80a1('bum): stong pa nyid du stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong
80a2('bum): tshe/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
80a3('bum): gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs sdug
80a4('bum): bsngal ba nyid kyi/ stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba// nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs sdig
80a5('bum): bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs sdugabasngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi phye/ 
80a6('bum): rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lci tshe/ tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste
80a7('bum): rdo ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba sdig bsngal bu nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags la de yang tshor ba sdug bsngal
80a8('bum): nyid ma legs/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des
80b1('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
80b2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par m+b+hi gyi ste/ dri co'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'dun sa sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du shes sdug bsngal
80b3('bum): ba nyid gyis stong ste/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid/ 
80b4('bum): ma mchis te/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
80b5('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du she/ sa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du
80b6('bum): byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas por myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i srid du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed spu ga bsngal ba nyid 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 
80b7('bum): 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang legs pa de yang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid ma legs/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed sdug bsdu
80b8('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa/ 
81a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas
81a2('bum): par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi sto
81a3('bum): pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong/ 
81a4('bum): pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal bzhi dang ngo do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
81a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha ro long du phyin
81a6('bum): zol skyong pa'i tshe/ gzugs 'dig myed de zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs padag myed pa nyid gzugs bdag myed pa nyid kyis
81a7('bum): stong ste/ gzu gas bdag myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs bdag myed pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs bdag myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs
81a8('bum): bdag myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs bdag myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thos/ shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyin dpa/ 
81b1('bum): la spyod pa'i ched gzugasu bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de cini
81b2('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni tshor ba bdag myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba bdag myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de sang tshor ba bdag myed pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba bdag myed/ 
81b3('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tsho 'i bdagi myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba bdag myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dag/ 
81b4('bum): sems dpa' chen thos/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi skyed pa'i tshe/ tshor ba bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas ba kyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
81b5('bum): 'dushes padag myed do rjes kyi ba gnas par khyo ba'i slad she na/ su ldan sa drin sa 'ang gaskyed pa nyid du shes bdug myong cini lus ste
81b6('bum): shes nga ga myod pa nyid kyi slong zhing gang lags pa du ba du shes deg skyed pashing sa lag / shes pa 'i skyed dasu kun rnye pa nyid sus / zhes nga
81b7('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid// stong banyid kyang 'du shes bdag snyed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam gras des na/ byang chub sems dpo'i sems dpa'i rten pos de shes rab kyi pha rol du du phyin pa la spyong ba'i
81b8('bum): tshugs bdag myed do zhes gyi bar gnas par skye bgyi'o// des shes rab kyis ma du phyin pa mi spyod po'i tshe/ 'du byed bdag byed de nas bgyi bar gnas par myi rgya snyed ci'i srid du na ni/ 
82a1('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid gis stong ste/ 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid ma lags// 'du byed/ 
82a2('bum): bdag myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems
82a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
82a4('bum): shes pa bdag myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam pa shes pa bdag myed pa nyid rnam par shes po bdag myed pa nyid
82a5('bum): kyis stong ste/ nom rtse par shes pa bdag myed pa nyid kyi stong pa dgyi gang legs pa de yang rnam par shes pa bdag nyid ma gas/ rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa nyid las gud na yang
82a6('bum): bzhid ma mchis te/ rnam pa ma shes pa bdag myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa ny-id kyang rnam pa shes pa bdag myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
82a7('bum): chen zas/ shes rab kyi sa ro sad du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa bdag myed de zhes bgyi bar gnas par myo ba gyi'o// bcom ldan des gzhan yang byang chu sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pos/ 
82a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa mo che/ gzugs zhi'i zhes bgyi bur gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du ne no/ bcom ldan pa des de ni 'di ltar gzugs zhi ba nyid gzugs ni banyid kyis stong / 
82b1('bum): gzugs zhi ba nyid sngo kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs zhi ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do// / 
82b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi
82b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba zhi ba nyid tshor ba zhi pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyi sto
82b4('bum): pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba nyi zhi ba nyid ma lags/ tshor ba bzhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba zhi ba nyid do// bcom
82b5('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i me tshor ba zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes ra
82b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes zhi ba nyid 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du
82b7('bum): shes zhi ba nyid gi stong panyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes zhi ba nyid ma lags 'du shes zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes zhing / 
82b8('bum): nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des
83a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed zhi'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed zhi ba nyid 'du byed/ 
83a2('bum): zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed zhi ba nyid ma lags/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed zhing
83a3('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
83a4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa zhi'o zhes pa da kyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ deci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam
83a5('bum): par shes pa 'i zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam pa shes pa zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid me lags/ rnam par shes
83a6('bum): ba zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub
83a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa zhi'o zhes bgyi bar ga nas par myi bgyi'o/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang
83a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi ba~Mgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
83b1('bum): de ni 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid gzugs stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs stong pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs stong pa nyid las gud na yang
83b2('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
83b3('bum): dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshegazugs stong zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
83b4('bum): tshor ba ste zhes bgyi bar gnas par mya ba gyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom lda na 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba stong pa nyid tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis
83b5('bum): stong ste tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang sde lags pa de yang tshor ba ste/ ngapa nyid ma lagasatshor ba stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 
83b6('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ tshor ba stong pa nyid do/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen pos
83b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rje tshor ba stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// nges shes rab kyi pho ro mad tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
83b8('bum): shes stong zhes bgyi ba ro gnas par myo bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes stong pa nyid/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyis stong sa
84a1('bum): 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes stong pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyang
84a2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes
84a3('bum): stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
84a4('bum): 'di ltar 'du byed stong pa nyid 'du byed stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed stong pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis
84a5('bum): te/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi
84a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom lnga des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
84a7('bum): par shes pa snying nge zhes bgyi bar gnas pa rjo/ myi bgyi ste/ de gA'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid rnam par shes
84a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ma lags rnam par shes pa stong
84b1('bum): gnal sa su gzhan nga/ nga chub sus su masas suni so
84b2('bum): lam su ni/ med pa 'ingam mas te/ gzugs mdzanas myed ma'o/ 
84b3('bum): ma ldan 'as rnam grangs sa na/ nga ba sa phyi / 
84b4('bum): mtshanas myong / nas bgyi ba gnas par myo 'i/ ngas nas rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la spyang pa / 
85a1('bum): gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyis song ste/ tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba mtshan myed pa nyid
85a2('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba mtshan myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
85a3('bum): tshor ba mtshan myed pa nyid do// bco ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba mtshan me myedo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o/ 
85a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid 'du she
85a5('bum): ma myed pa nyid gis stong ste/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes mtshan med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid las gud na yang / 
85a6('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes mtshan ma myong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ 
85a7('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed do// 
85a8('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed mtshan ma myong pa nyid 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid gyis stong ste/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyi/ 
85b1('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed mtshan ma myong pa nyid lags/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong
85b2('bum): nyid kyang 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon pa la spyod pa'i rkye/ 'du byed/ 
85b3('bum): mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed do zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de tsa'i
85b4('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par zhes pa ma tshan ma myang pa nyid rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid kyis stong ste rnam par shes pa mtshan ma meng pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid gang lags
85b5('bum): pa de yang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid ma lags/ rnab ra shes pa mtshan ma myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa
85b6('bum): kyang stong pa nyidas/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma mya dang nyid de/ bsam ldan 'das rnam kAngs ngas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma
85b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed do// zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
85b8('bum): pa'i tshe/ gzugs mya smond pa myed/ zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i phyi slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs smon pa myed pa nyid gzugs/ smond pa myed
86a1('bum): byeng pa nyid kyis thong po// gzugs spyad bskyed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang migs pa de yang gzugs smon pa skyed pa nyid malags/ gzugs ston pa med pa nyid pas gung na yang
86a2('bum): ting ma mchis nyi du gzugs sbyan pa myeng pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid gtsug rlom nyid kyang gzugs sman pa myed pa nyid // bcom ldan las rnam klangs nges na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa sa dpa chen lda
86a3('bum): tu pa sang byen pa la snang ba'adi/ gas sbyin pa spyod nas bkyi rjengs su pa ma bya// ngas kyi pa thong du byin pa la snang ba'ini/ char bstan pa med nga nas bkye ba gnas par
86a4('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba smon pa myed rapa nyid tshe rab smon pa myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba smon pa/ myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba
86a5('bum): smin pa myeng pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba smin pa myed pa nyid las gung ni yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba smon pa myed pa nyid kya stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba smon pa myed pa nyi // 
86a6('bum): sa mas das sems pa' sems na / du khyed du byung / spyon pa myed sasu
86b1('bum): byang smrad pa mang da kyi stong panyid gang lags pa yang rung pa nyidas lags/ da sa srung po nyingasas su 'dubyung kyi
86b2('bum): kyang stong bcad/ snang ba nyid kyang du byang stodong pa myed pa nyid / com ldan 'das rnam grangs deson nga nub sems dpa'as sangapa' chen pos/ sa ra'i stso ma
86b3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed smon pa myeng ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ par shes pa smand pa myang ngo / zhes bgyi bar gnas
86b4('bum): par myi bgyi ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rna bar shes pa sman pa meng pa nyid rnam par shes pa smon po med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa smon pa myang pa nyid gang lags
86b5('bum): de yang rnam par shes pa smind pa myed pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa smon pa myed pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa smonapa myed pa
87a1('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa smon pa myong ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
87a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa smon pa myed do// zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
87a3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs dben pa nyid gzugs dben pa nyid kyi stong ste/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyi/ 
87a4('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs dben pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs
87a5('bum): dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dben no zhes bgyi
87a6('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dben
87a7('bum): po nyid tshor ba dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba dben pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba
87a8('bum): dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
87b1('bum): tshe'atshor ba dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom
87b2('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes dben pa nyid 'du shes dab na pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes dben pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes dben pa nyid las
87b3('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' ses
87b4('bum): dpa'i chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes dben no zhes bgyi bar mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed dben no zhes
87b5('bum): bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom/ ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar/ 'du byed dben pa nyid 'du byed dben/ pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang
87b6('bum): lags pa de yang 'du byed dben pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed dben pa nyid las gud na yang / stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed dben pa nyid do// 
87b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
87b8('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa dben no// zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi sde de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar rnam
88a1('bum): par shes pa dben pa nyid rnam par shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes
88a2('bum): ba dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid ben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid do/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub rim
88a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
88a4('bum): dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe de bzhin nyid la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis/ 
88a5('bum): stong ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang de bzhi na nyid ma lags/ de bzhin nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyidam mchis te/ de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
88a6('bum): de bzhin nyid do/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom
88a7('bum): ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos nyid la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'ad/ 
88a8('bum): de ni 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos nyid ma lags/ chos nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
88b1('bum): kyang chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos nyid la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan
88b2('bum): 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de
88b3('bum): ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos kyi dbyings las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos
88b4('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// nga bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga
88b5('bum): spyod pa'i chen chos kyi dbyings la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ na pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
88b6('bum): chos skyon myed pa nyid la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos skyon myed chos skyon myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lag/ 
88b7('bum): pa de yang chos skyon myed pa nyid ma lags/ chos skyon myed pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos skyon myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon myed pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das
88b8('bum): rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos skyon myed pa nyid la gnas par myi bgyi'o// 
89a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par myi bgyi ste/ 
89a2('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags/ yang
89a3('bum): dag pa'i mtha' las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems
89a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par myi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
89a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thubs myirma khas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gyir bgyi ba la ga/ nas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs/ 
89a6('bum): mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tund pa la myi spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
89a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gyi dbagyi ba lta gnas pa'i yid kyis tshor ba lo gnas na/ de tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pa ma/ 
89a8('bum): tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag
89b1('bum): gyir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du shes la gnas na/ de 'du shes mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se
89b2('bum): dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gyir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ 'du byed la gnas na de 'du byed ma pa
89b3('bum): 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
89b4('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gyir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rnam par shes pa la gnas na de rnam par shes pa mngon paradu bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi
89b5('bum): spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa 'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes/ rab kyi pha rolod tu phyin pa la yongasasu zin par myi 'gyur/ 
89b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'ju ga par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
89b7('bum): du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / 
89b8('bum): bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ myig la gnas na de myig mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
90a1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i
90a2('bum): yid kyis rna ba la gnas na de rna ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod gi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
90a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ sna la gnas na de snga mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
90a4('bum): phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / 
90a5('bum): bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ lce la gnas na de lce mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te khyang
90a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ lus la gnas na
90a7('bum): de lus mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mo spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
90a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ yid la gnas na de yid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
90b1('bum): la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha
90b2('bum): rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor de la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 
90b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis
90b4('bum): gzugs la gnas na de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi mar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo mi spyod do// bcom ldan la dngas gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
90b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba laganas pa'i yid kyi sa sgra la gnas na de sgra mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes
90b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs ma mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi
90b7('bum): ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ dril granas na de dri mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
90b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rol gnas na de ro mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi
91a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
91a2('bum): mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ reg pa la gnas na de reg mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang po la mi spyod do// bcom
91a3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'o yid kyis
91a4('bum): chos la gnas na de chos mngon par 'du bgyi ba la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi
91a5('bum): rol tu phyind pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor de la snyoms par 'jug pa/ ra mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs
91a6('bum): par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
91a7('bum): spyod pa'i chon thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ myig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas na de myig gi rnam par shes rab pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba
91a8('bum): la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ma spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
91b1('bum): pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la gnas na de na pa'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
91b2('bum): pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pos bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gor
91b3('bum): ba la gnos pa'i yid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de sna'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas
91b4('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mra khas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas
91b5('bum): yid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de lce'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
91b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ 
91b7('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon por 'du bgyi po la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la mi spyong rdo// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
91b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gar bgyi bol gnas pa'i yid kyis/ yid kyi rna par shes
92a1('bum): pa la gnas na de yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i
92a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ 
92a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
92a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bAdag gir bgyi ba la ga/ danas pa'i yid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas na
92a5('bum): de mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
92a6('bum): zo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de rna ba'i 'dus
92a7('bum): te reg pa mngon par 'dra bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mo spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha ma tu phyi/ 
92a8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de sna'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba
92b1('bum): la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
92b2('bum): mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha
92b3('bum): rol tu phyi nad pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba
92b4('bum): dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ lus kyi 'ang das te reg pa la gnas na/ de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon dpar 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
92b5('bum): pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi
92b6('bum): ba dang bdag gror bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// 
92b7('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
92b8('bum): 'i rnal 'byor de la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
93a1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas ba ngag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid
93a2('bum): kyis/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom
93a3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdog gir bgyi ba la gnas po'i yid kyis
93a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ den nga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba pa spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do/ 
93a5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gam/ 
93a6('bum): pa'i yid kyis/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// 
93a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi khas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid
93a8('bum): kyisas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan
93b1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lus kyi
93b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
93b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa/ 
93b4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes dab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon
93b5('bum): par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zinang par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal
93b6('bum): 'byor de la snyoms pa ra 'dug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ba na mi 'gyur ro/ bcom
93b7('bum): ljon 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa lnga spyod pa'i rje/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi zil gnas pa'i
93b8('bum): kyis/ sa'i khams la gnas na/ de'i sa'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ sheso rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dbul
94a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis chu'i khams la gnas na de chu'i khas
94a2('bum): mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
94a3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ me'i khams la gnas na de'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi
94a4('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' se rnams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la
94a5('bum): gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rlung gi khams la gnas na de rlung gi te khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
94a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ nam mkha'i
94a7('bum): khams la gnas na/ de nam mkha'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lnga mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
94a8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba lo gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rnam por shes pa'i khams la gnas na
94b1('bum): de rnam par shes pa'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
94b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor de la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes
94b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
94b4('bum): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi dmakhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la ga/ nas pa'i yid kyis/ ma rig pa la gnas na de ma rig pa
94b5('bum): mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chupa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du tu
94b6('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du byed la gnas na/ de 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ 
94b7('bum): gos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pos bdag
94b8('bum): tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom
95a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la
95a2('bum): gnas pa'i yid kyis/ mying dang gzugs la gnas na de ming dang gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se
95a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ skye mched drug la gnas na/ 
95a4('bum): de skye mched drug mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab dkyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gang+gA de te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
95a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas pa ngag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis reg pa la gnas na de reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
95a6('bum): spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
95a7('bum): bos bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis tshor rab la gnas na/ de tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom lda
95a8('bum): 'das gal ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po na sa kyi bcom du phyin pa la myod pa'i rtse/ byas mi mtshan thos bdas su kyi nga dog gi bgyi tshol gnas pa chi
95b1('bum): kyis sred pa la gnas na de sred pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' se mos dpa' chen
95b2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ len pa la gnas na de len pa mngon par 'du
95b3('bum): bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
95b4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la dganas pa'i yid kyis srid pa la gnas na/ de srid pa mdo na par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol
95b5('bum): tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
95b6('bum): pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ skye ba la gnas na/ de skye ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom
95b7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu ba gyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi bo la gnas pa'i yid
95b8('bum): kyis/ rga shi la gnas na de rga shi mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spod pa'i byang chub sems
96a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur
96a2('bum): te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' ses
96a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas na/ 
96a4('bum): de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba nga la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
96a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gor ba/ gyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
96a6('bum): phyi nang pa la gnas na/ de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
96a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
96a8('bum): la gnas na/ de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
96b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de
96b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
96b3('bum): ra gyi ba'i mang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thangs kyi mkhas pos bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la gan san/ de bsam
96b4('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du 'gyi spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
96b5('bum): chen po zhes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshethabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdog gor rgya ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sa

96b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zind par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab
96b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bam po drug pa'o// 
97a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gi
97a2('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te
97a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis phyi stong pa nyid la gnas
97a4('bum): na/ des phyi stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'dus gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
97a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mo mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gi ra bgyi ba la gnas pa 'i yid kyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de phyi nang
97a6('bum): stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
97a7('bum): phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mo mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du
97a8('bum): bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
97b1('bum): mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas na de chen po stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
97b2('bum): phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu ba gyi ba
97b3('bum): dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la mi spyod
97b4('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang
97b5('bum): bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ 'dus bya// sa stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma na par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
97b6('bum): pA la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag
97b7('bum): gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod
97b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i
98a1('bum): yid kyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom
98a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ 
98a3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang /

98a5('bum): nyid la gnas na/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du/ bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
98a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gaur bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
98a7('bum): la gnas na/ de rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/

98b1('bum): stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
98b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par
98b3('bum): 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
98b4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi pa la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas na de myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi
98b5('bum): pa la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
98b6('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi / 
98b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag
98b8('bum): tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// bco ldan
99a1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la

99a6('bum): bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas na/ de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod/ 
99a7('bum): do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su zi nad par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

99b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ 
99b2('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas na/ de yang dag par spong ba rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la

100a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis dbang po rnams la gnas na/ de dbang po rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes//
