145b7('bum): du rab tu shes so// sred pa ni sred pa ni'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
145b8('bum): rab tu shes so// len pa ni le nad pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
146a1('bum): rab tu shes so// srid pa ni srid pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa/ 
146a2('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// skye ba ni skye ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
146a3('bum): du rab tu shes so// rga sha~M ni na shi'i rang bzhini dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha ro mang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ched/ yang dag pa ji la ba bzhin du rab tu zhes
146a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin dpa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de bya du chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
146a5('bum): rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral
146a6('bum): ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bzod pa'i pha ro lang tu phyinang pa ni bzod pa'i
146a7('bum): pha rolang tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ 
146a8('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha yang tu phyinang pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
146b1('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
146b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste
146b3('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che po shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji ma pa bzhin du rag tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang myong
146b4('bum): pi nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i ra che/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyi
146b5('bum): stong pa nyid ni phyi slod pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ram nyid tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
146b6('bum): rab tu shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba te/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
146b7('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang ma bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
146b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
147a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems
147a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba
147a3('bum): ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas
147a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin dad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ 
147a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' lngas 'dasab stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sa/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
147a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa
147a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha mang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// der bskyed pa stong ba nyid ni dor ba skyed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba skye
147a8('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ra
147b1('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad stong pa/ 
147b2('bum): nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
147b3('bum): tu shes so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhigi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/ 
147b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi// rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
147b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral
147b6('bum): ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa
147b7('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dngos po myed
147b8('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yon
148a1('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems
148a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni yang ya dag par spong bzhi'i rang bzhin dang / 
148a3('bum): bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe \u0f7f/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi ni rdzu
148a4('bum): 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
148a5('bum): du rab tu shes so// dbang po lnga ni dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin du nga bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
148a6('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhidon du rab tu shes so// stobs lnga ni stobs lnga'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
148a7('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
148a8('bum): pa ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba sten
148b1('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i
148b2('bum): reng bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bsam gtan bzhi ni bas/ 
148b3('bum): gtan bzhi'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshad myed pa bzhi'o
148b4('bum): ni tshad myed pa bzhi'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
148b5('bum): shes so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni ga zugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i rang bzhin dang / bral po ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
148b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni rnam par thard pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
148b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni mthard
148b8('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
149a1('bum): du rab tu shes so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i rang / 
149a2('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mngon par shes pa rnams ni
149a3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
149a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste dengade byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
149a5('bum): rab tu shes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ 
149a6('bum): tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
149a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
149a8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub seMs
149b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
149b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems da
149b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos mu 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco/ 
149b4('bum): brgyad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i// tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang
149b5('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
149b6('bum): tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
149b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
149b8('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
150a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang / 
150a2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gi rnams pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sos
150a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
150a4('bum): dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ dran po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ya/ dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa
150a5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bra la ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
150a6('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
150a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
150a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos nyid ni chos nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' seMs
150b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi phyi ngas kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems/ 
150b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos kyi gnas/ nyid ni chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ 
150b3('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos skyon myed pa nyid ni chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi ra
150b4('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dang da' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yang dag
150b5('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chubapa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
150b6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 
150b7('bum): dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o// bam po// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni
150b8('bum): ris bu/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni jil bu/ 'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni jil bu/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ril bu/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dzi le bu/ phyag gi rang bzhin ni rjes bu
151a1('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu// gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sgra'i rang
151a2('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dri'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ro'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ reg gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i rnam par
151a3('bum): shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang
151a4('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i 'dra dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang
151a5('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta// bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu ba// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyi sa tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji
151a6('bum): lta bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin na ji lta bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni
151a7('bum): ji lta bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg po'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu// sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chu'i khams
151a8('bum): kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ me'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin na d+hiH ts+tsha/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin
151b1('bum): snyings su// ma rig pa'i sna bzhin na wA Ta/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni dzi sa n+tu/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dri drim zu/ mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ris du skye mched dus
151b2('bum): gi rang bzhin ni dzi lA bu rig pa'i rang bzhin ni dris bu/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni na du/ sred pa'i rang bzhi na dus nu/ bzhin wA r+ya/ srid pa ra nga bzhin ni ngan
151b3('bum): skye ba'i nga bzhin n+d+ha ba~M/ sapa'i rang shin na su/ sbyin pa'i slong tu phyi seM na/ rgyad na du sa
151b4('bum): pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta buM/ brtson 'grus kyi pa ri la phyinang pa nI dzi lta bu/ bsam gtan gi phyi rol tu phyinas pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ nas rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa
151b5('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni rje la gyu/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhini ni ji lta bur stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi
151b6('bum): bzhin nongs su/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni lta du/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni nan nu/ dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin da bu/ 'dus ma byas song pa nyid
151b7('bum): bzhin nu lta bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni sa bu/ thogs dngas pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi blonan no ngas chu/ rang bskyed pa slong ny-id kyi rang pozhin nongs nu
151b8('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni jis bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni jis bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid niji stong pa nyid kyi ring bzhin nong bu/ myi dpyugs pa spong po nyid kyi
152a1('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 
152a2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin
152a3('bum): ni ji lta bu/ stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin gi ji lta bu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu// 'phags pa'i
152a4('bum): ni ji lta bu/ stabs rnams kyi bzhin na ji lta bu/ byang chub bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin ni lta bu/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi rang bzhin/ 
152a5('bum): ni ji lta bu/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par tha rad pa'i rnams kyi ra nga bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
152a6('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta
152a7('bum): bya/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni
152a8('bum): ji lta bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi
152b1('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dag
152b2('bum): bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin na ji lta bu/ rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ de
152b3('bum): bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ra
152b4('bum): bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ 
152b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bya/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dang // sa po myed pa'o// tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'du byed kyi rang / 
152b6('bum): bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// myig gi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rna ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed po'o// sna'i rang bzhin ni dngos
152b7('bum): po myed pa'o// lho'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// lus kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// yid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// sgra'i rang
152b8('bum): bzhini ni dngos po myed pa'o// dri'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// ro'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// reg gi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// chos kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// myig
153a1('bum): gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// 
153a2('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// myig gi 'dus
153a3('bum): te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin
153a4('bum): ni dngos po myed pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang ba zhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg rig pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
153a5('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rna/ ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dang sa po myed pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i
153a6('bum): rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyund kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// 
153a7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// me'i khams
153a8('bum): kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhini ni dngos po myed pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
153b1('bum): lo myed pa'o// ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myang ba'o// mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin
153b2('bum): ni dngos po myed pa'o// skye mched drug gi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// sred pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos
153b3('bum): po myed pa'o// len pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// srid pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// skye bo'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o/ ma na'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// 
153b4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed/ pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i rang bzhin ning dngos po myed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni
153b5('bum): dngos po myed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// bsam gtan gi pA rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// shes rab
153b6('bum): pha rol tu phyinang pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po
153b7('bum): myed pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'dus byas stong
153b8('bum): po nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po byed pa'o// thog pa dang tha ma skyed pa/ 
154a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rang bzhin na stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chos thams cad
154a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong
154a3('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
154a4('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// dbang po
154a5('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag R+Sha sa kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// la ma~M gi rang bzhin ni
154a6('bum): dngos po myed pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa
154a7('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
154a8('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ 
154b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin
154b2('bum): dngos po myed pa'o// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// so so yang dag par rig par rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni dngos po
154b3('bum): myed pa'o// snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po
154b4('bum): myed pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni/ dngos po myed pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhi na ni dngos po myed pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
154b5('bum): po myed pa'o// rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed
154b6('bum): de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngas po myed po na/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// ga'anam yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed bya'o// chos nyid kyi ro
154b7('bum): bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed du'o// chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa ro/ ngos skyon myed pa nyid kyi rung bzhin ni dngos po byed pa'o// yang
154b8('bum): dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni dngos po myed pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin myeng pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / 
155a1('bum): 'du shes la 'du shes kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnams par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / myig la myig gi rang
155a2('bum): bzhin myed pa dang / rna ba la rna ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / sna' la sna'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lce la lce'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lus la lus kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / yid la yid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / 
155a3('bum): gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / sgra la sgra'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / dri la dri'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rol ro'i rang bzhin med pa dang / reg la rog la gi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos la chos
155a4('bum): kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang // myig gi rnam par shes pa la myig gi/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhini myed pa dang / rna ba'i rnam pa/ ra shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / 
155a5('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mye da pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa 'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus
155a6('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang // myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin
155a7('bum): skye pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lha'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te/ 
155a8('bum): reg pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
155a9('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid la kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa'o// 
155b1('bum): tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus
155b2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
155b3('bum): tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / sa'i khas
155b4('bum): la sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / me'i khams la me'i khams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi rang
155b5('bum): bzhin myed pa dang / nam mkha'i khams la nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rna ma par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang // ma rig
155b6('bum): pa la ma rig pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / mying dang gzugs la mying dang gzugs kyi rang
155b7('bum): bzhin myed pa dang / skye mched drug lnga skye mched drug gi rang bzhin myed pa dang / reg pa la reg pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / sred pa la sred pa'i rang bzhin myed
155b8('bum): pa dang / len pa la lond pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / srid pa la srid pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / skye ba la skye ba'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rga shi rga shi'i rang bzhin myed pa dang // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
156a1('bum): la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang
156a2('bum): pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la/ 
156a3('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang // nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
156a4('bum): myed pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mye dad pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang ba/ bzhin myed pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
156a5('bum): kyi rang bzhin myong ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la de/ na dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhini myed pa dang / 'dus byas stong
156a6('bum): pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong
156a7('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa/ 
156a8('bum): dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang
156b1('bum): gri mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
156b2('bum): kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa
156b3('bum): dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang
156b4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / dbang po rnams la dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / stobs rnams la stobs rnams kyi
156b5('bum): rang bzhin myed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lhag rnams la bya nga chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad/ 
156b6('bum): pa'i rang bzhini myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chad/ 
156b7('bum): myed pa rnams la tshad myed pa rnams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rnam
156b8('bum): sor tha rad pa brgyangs rnam par thar de pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / mthar dkyis gnas pa'i sems par 'dug pa dgul/ mtho rad kyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin myed pa / 
157a1('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / 
157a2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams la ting nge 'dzinang gi rang bzhin myed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo'i sgo'i rang bzhin
157a3('bum): myed pa dang / de bzhin de gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi la myi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig
157a4('bum): pa bzhi la so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / snyi rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sangs rgyas
157a5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang // rgyu nad tu zhug sa pa'i 'bras bu la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang ba zhin myed pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan cig phyir
157a6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin myed pa dang / rang byang chub la
157a7('bum): rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / lam gri rnam pa shes pa nyid la lom gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyon pa nyid
157a8('bum): rang bzhin myed pa dang // de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma mi/ 
157b1('bum): pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos nyid la chos nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi gnas nyid kyi
157b2('bum): rang bzhin myed pa dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid la chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myed pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin myed par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 
157b3('bum): gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid myed do// tshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// 'du shes la 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid myed do// 'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid myed do// rnam par shes pa
157b4('bum): la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// myig la myig gi mtshan nyid myed do// rna ba la rna ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// sna la sna'i mtshan nyid myed do// lce la lce'i mtshan nyid myed do// lus la
157b5('bum): lus kyi mtshan nyid myed do/ yid la yid kyi mtshan nyid myed do// gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid myed do// sgra la sgra'i mtshan nyid myed do// dri la dri'i rang bzhin mtshan nyid myed do// 
157b6('bum): ro la ro'i mtshan nyid myed do// reg la reg gi mtshan nyid myed do// chos la chos kyi mtshan nyid myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa la myig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// rna ba'i rnam par
157b7('bum): shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// 
157b8('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myig gi
158a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do/ lcen
158a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan
158a3('bum): nyid myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa/ 
158a4('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
158a5('bum): la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid mye/ da do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la lu sa kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myed do// 
158a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myong ngo // sa'i khams la sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid myed do// chu'i khams la chu'i khas

164a2('bum): myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi/

164a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba ya/ myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa rnams myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi/ 
164a5('bum): stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// pa so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang / 
164a6('bum): dmyigs so/ byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang kyi dmyigs so// snang rje chen po snying rje che pos stong ste/ ngas skye ba yang myi daphyogs 'byung ba yang
164a7('bum): dmyigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyun tu/ 
164a8('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir bya 'ong 'bras bus stong ste/ 
164b1('bum): de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyig so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// dgra bcom pa nyid dgra can
164b2('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid
164b3('bum): lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmying
164b4('bum): 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhi na nyid de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs// 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de/ 
164b5('bum): bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba/ 
164b6('bum): yang myi dmyigs so// chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang
164b7('bum): myi dmyigs so// chos kyi byings gnas nyid chos kyi gnas nyid kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// chos skyon myed pa nyid chos skyon myed pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 
164b8('bum): de la skyed pa yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyig so/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha'as stong ste/ de la skye ba yang myi dmyigs 'byung ba yang myi dmyigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
165a1('bum): sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dbege ba yin te/ de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad sa khyed / 
165a2('bum): pa nyid du nye ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// de ji lta ji ltar lus yongasu dag pa dang
165a3('bum): ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par gyur pa de lta de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i seMs skyed do// 
165a4('bum): zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems myi skyed do// gti mug dang lnga na pa'i sems myi skyed do// nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang sgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang / 'phra dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang / sred pa dang
165a5('bum): ldan pa dang lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems myi skyed do// de 'dod chags kyi sems myi skyed cing / zhe sdang dang gti mug nga/ nga / nga rgyal dang sgyu dang g.yo dang / 'phro dog dang ser sna dang sred
165a6('bum): pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems myi skyed pas/ nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar myi 'gyur te/ khor zug rtag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtigs pa
165a7('bum): nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar myi 'gyur ro// de sems can yongasu smin por bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ 
165a8('bum): nam yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur kyi bar du/ nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// 
165b1('bum): debs na me dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ yon tan dang legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rtson 'grus myi gta/ 
165b2('bum): par spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ba
165b3('bum): gyur pa yin no// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u lnga pa'o// 
165b4('bum): bam po// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
165b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol na tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzug sa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ gal te tshor ba la spyod na mtshan
165b6('bum): ma la spyod do// gal te 'du shes la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te 'du byed la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
165b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rgyu/ thab sa myi mkhas pas gzugs rtag ce sngo bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'as
165b8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs myi rtag ces po gyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom
166a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
166a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs sdug sngal zhes bgyi ba ro spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod
166a3('bum): do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
166a4('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'ithabs myi mkhas pas gzugs bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na/ 
166a5('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs zhi zhes
166a6('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ying tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs su ni
166a7('bum): zhes bgyi bor spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs phyi mkhas pas gzugs dben
166a8('bum): zhes bgyi bar myod na mchan ma la spyod de/ bcom ldan 'des gal sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pa'o mang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che thangs phyi mdzes pas gzugs bye zer ni
166b1('bum): spyod ma tshan ma sa spyod de/ btsu ldan 'das ga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po nas rab kyi pa song sbyin pas ngas kyi mabs pas tshor ba na
166b2('bum): bar spyod namatshan ma la spyod de/ bcom ldan 'das gas/ chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thogs nas kyi mang/ tho du pal spyang ba / thabs kyi mkhas bris tshor ba dzang
166b3('bum): zhes byegyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa na po zhes bkyi pa ma tu phyin pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi ma
166b4('bum): pas tshor ba sdug sngal zhes par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang po la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
166b5('bum): mkhas pas tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lo spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
166b6('bum): mkhas pas tshor ba bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe bcos
166b7('bum): skye sakhas pas tshor bzhi zhos bgyi bar spyod nam can ma la spyod da bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thogs rab kyi rom du phyid pa la spyod po'i ched thabs kyi
167a1('bum): mkhas pas tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
167a2('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
167a3('bum): myi mkhas pas tshor ba myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na motshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
167a4('bum): mkhas pas 'du shes rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la de spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa la spyod pa'i tshe//

167a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bor spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa/ 
167a8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du nas bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma ma spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
167b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du shes bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa

167b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas 'du shes myi dbe no zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gsate byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
167b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do 'tshe/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
167b7('bum): rolong tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
167b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab so myi mkhas pas 'du byed bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
168a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po zhes rab kyi 'a'os
168a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thobs kyi mkhas pas 'ang byed bdag ces bgyi bar skyed dam chen ma la spyod de/ bcom las nas gas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi rol tu phyid pa la spyod pa'i ched

168a7('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bgyi da

168b1('bum): mtshan pa pa spyod // bcom ldan sa pa kyang chu sems dang sems dpang chen po zhes ra kyi rol tu phyid pa la spyod pa tshe/ zabs kyims ma rnam panas padrug na
168b2('bum): mtshan ma la spyod / bcom ldan 'das gapa byang chub sems dpa' sems pa'i chen pa zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa'i spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs phyi marnas pas rngam pa shes pa bdag cam bgyi ra spyod ni
168b3('bum): mam myong / com ldan das gal byang chub sems dpa sa sadapa' chen mogs kyi pa ma tu spyon pal spyod pa'in/ ngas phyi ma kham pas rnam pa zhes pa zla ma brgya'i smrad

169a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig rjes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das/

169a8('bum): myi mkhas pas myig ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig dben
169b1('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod namatshan ma spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs phyi mkhas pas myig mi dben nas dgyi
169b2('bum): bur spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myam khas pas rdza ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ 
169b3('bum): chomo ldan las gal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi rlom tu phyin pa sa spyod pa'i me/ thabs phyimakhas pas na ba rtsinag ces bskyo byar spyod nam canapa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'as ga
169b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mokhas pas rnab padagos bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das sil te byang chub sems dpa' sos/ 
169b5('bum): dpa' chen pashes rab kyi la 'o sang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bran gos kyi skakhas pas rnab sdug stsal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mod+ha/ smin ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
169b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa'i sring tu phyinang do la spyod pa'i tshe thabs kyimabs pas rnab bdag cis gyi bar spyod namatshan ma la spong / bcom ldan las gal byeng chub sems camams dpa' chen no
169b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi slebs pas rnab bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
169b8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can pogs rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
170a1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba 'a ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
170a2('bum): pas rna ba dban zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi khams pas rnab mi dben zhes bgyi ba
170a3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi khams pas sna rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// 
170a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
170a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod / pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
170a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyong pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna sdug bsngal na sa bgyi bor spyang na mtshan ma la~M spyong / bcom ldan 'das gso/ 
170a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
170a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems da'
170b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
170b2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas snga ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sgyid do// bcom ldan 'das galang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

170b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyad na mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan
170b8('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ lce bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ bco ldan 'das

175b6('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chos sdug sngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal
175b7('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs myi mkhas pas chos bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gel te byang chub
175b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs myi mkhas pas chos bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se/ 
176a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chos zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
176a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
176a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chos dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
176a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkha/ sa pas chos dben zhes bya bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bco// ma ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
176a5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas myig gyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
176a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas myig gyi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
176a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas myig gyi rnam par shes pa bde'o zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
176a8('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug sngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ 
176b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
176b2('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gi rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces
176b3('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gyi rnam par shes
176b4('bum): pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas myig gyi rnam
176b5('bum): par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// ba// com ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'// chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
176b6('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas myig gyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi ba ra spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
176b7('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gi rnam par shes pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na
176b8('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpan
177a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub

180b7('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
180b8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
181a1('bum): ldan sug rgyu nub sem bu mas dang chen tha man kyis phyin pa laspyod pa'i na/ tha chim la pas rna chu ma pa da gyi gargya ma rgya

181a8('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyo/ 
181a9('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thobs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes brgya
181b1('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
181b2('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba'i/ 
181b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
181b4('bum): mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
181b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
181b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pos sna'i 'dus te reg pa bder zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
181b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
181b8('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
182a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
182a2('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
182a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
182a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po / sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkha sa pas snga'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ 
182a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab sa myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ 
182a6('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te rig pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod/ 
182a7('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod/ 
182a8('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa bde'o zhes bgyi bar
182b1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug sngal zhes bgyi
182b2('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces
182b3('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag
182b4('bum): med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
182b5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
182b6('bum): myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
182b7('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
182b8('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
183a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
183a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
183a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bde'o zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
183a4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi// pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes
183a5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi

183a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
183a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te

183b4('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
183b5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la smra da do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa

184a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
184a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub mo// 
184b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

184b3('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gi 'dus te/ 
184b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug sngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtsha na ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
184b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshe na mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs
184b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
184b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas myig gi 'dus te reg po'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi/ 
184b8('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myig gyi 'dus te reg pa

185a5('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'ang sa gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
185a6('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
185a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde' zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
185a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug sngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
185a9('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang

185b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pasaM sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma latsha spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te

186a1('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
