186a6('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' som sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi ng+ge/ 
186a7('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg
186a8('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi khas
186b1('bum): pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
186b2('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sas
186b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
186b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pa sa lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces
186b5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ga/ la te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
186b6('bum): mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde'i zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
186b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug sngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs/ 
186b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
187a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
187a2('bum): bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'as
187a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhe zhes bgyi' bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
187a4('bum): mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma zhi zhe sa bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
187a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pa sa lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang / 
187a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ 
187a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshur ba rtag ces rgya
187a8('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thebs mya mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen/ 
187b1('bum): kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ 
187b2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde' zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
187b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba sdug sngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 
187b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab sa myi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
187b5('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ 
187b6('bum): bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi
187b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
187b8('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mo zhi zhes bgyi bar spyad na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa me' chen po shes
188a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dbyen zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
188a2('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na
188a3('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa/ 
188a4('bum): rkyen ca kyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na ma tshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem das dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ 
188a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi rtag ces bgyi bar smra da na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
188a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde' zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
188a7('bum): la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis
188a8('bum): tshor ba sdug sngal zhes bgyi bar myi spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' so mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs// 
188b1('bum): myi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
188b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces se bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
188b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ 
188b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis cher
188b5('bum): ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
188b6('bum): mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
188b7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' ses
188b8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sa'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
189a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sa'i khams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 
189a2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sa'i khams bde'i zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
189a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar myi spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
189a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sa'i kha rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
189a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sa'i khams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bco ma ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
189a6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
189a7('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sa'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
189a8('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sa'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
189b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas sa'i khams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
189b2('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas chu'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
189b3('bum): bas chu'i khams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chu'i
189b4('bum): khams bde' zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi ma
189b5('bum): pas chu'i khams sdug sngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
189b6('bum): mkhas pas chu'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
189b7('bum): pas chu'i khams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshun
189b8('bum): khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chu'i khams ma zhi zhes/

190b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mye'i khams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
190b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlu/ nga gi khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
190b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rtse chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rlung gi khams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
190b7('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bde' zhes bgyi bar spyod na ma la spya
190b8('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs myi mkhas pas rlung gi khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
191a1('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bdag ces bgyi bar
191a2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rlung gi khams bdag myed ces bgyi ba
191a3('bum): spyad na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rlung gi khams zhi zhes bgyi bar
191a4('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rlung gi
191a5('bum): khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lnga na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ren/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
191a6('bum): mkhas pas rlung gi khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
191a7('bum): mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
191a8('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams myi rtag ces rabagyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
191b1('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams bde'o zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rtse
191b2('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// 
191b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas nim mkha'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa/ 
191b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams bdag med ces bya bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal ra te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
191b5('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas nam/ mkha'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
191b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' ses
191b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'/ 
191b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas nam mkha'i khams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
192a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bco// 
192a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ 
192a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams bde' zhes bgyi bor spyod na mtshan
192a4('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'asems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams/ 
192a5('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po den sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi khas
192a6('bum): pas rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
192a7('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
192a8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod dri// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha/ 
192b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod la'i po/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
192b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs
192b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyad pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mtshan ma la spyod do// 
192b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa kha stong phrag brgya pa las le'u drug po'o// bamango/ 
192b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
192b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ma rig pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ga'ang byong chub sems dnga' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gyi ro lang du byin pa
192b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
192b8('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa bde' zhes byigyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
193a1('bum): ma rig pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa bdag ces
193a2('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa bdag med ces bya bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
193a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
193a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mi rig pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
193a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas ma rig pa dpe/ na zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das galete byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
193a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi rig pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod no mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
193a7('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas
193a8('bum): 'du byed myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed bde'o zhes kyi/ 
193b1('bum): gas tshulas rgyas pa me parnam sa kyi sngon pam gyu 'ing/ ya khyim las du byed ga me sa bar byung ngamatshanam mi byung /

193b3('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byeng bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom

193b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed ma zhi zhes pa du gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
193b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed dben ni sa bgyi bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gas
193b7('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rom tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas 'du byed mi dben zhes bya bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
193b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
193b9('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub ses/ 
194a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bde'i zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal

194a5('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas

194a7('bum): pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa dben

198b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tha/ bas myi mkhas pas srid pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod// / 
198b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi me khas pas srid pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// 
198b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas skye ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
198b8('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs myi mkhas pas skye ba myi rtog ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das/ 
199a1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba bde'i zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
199a2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas skye ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
199a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas skye ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
199a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye ba bdag rjes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
199a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'o tshe// thabs myi mkhas pas skye ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
199a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas skye ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
199a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas skye ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
199a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas skye ba rtag ce snang dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis
199b1('bum): ra gang du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs skye mkhas pasan shi na ga ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshanas pa spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 'osod du byed
199b2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rga shi myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa
199b3('bum): thab so myi mkhas pas rga shi bde'i zhes bgyi bar spyad na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thobs mi

199b6('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rga shi bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pA
199b7('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas rga shizhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa cha/ thabs mya ma
199b8('bum): pas rga shi ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs myi mkhas pas rga shi dben

200a2('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi ma khas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol
200a3('bum): tu phyind pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas

210a5('bum): rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sos
210a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
210a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bde'i zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das/ 
210a8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
210b1('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces brgya/ 
210b2('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab sa myi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
210b3('bum): pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas thog
210b4('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
210b5('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
210b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid de dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
210b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub seMs
210b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nga rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
211a1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ 
211a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bde'o zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ 
211a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
211a4('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na ma
211a5('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa nye'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag
211a6('bum): myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byond pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dor ba myed pa stong pa
211a7('bum): zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dor ba myed pa stong ba / 
211a8('bum): ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dor ba myed pa stong pa
211b1('bum): nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dor ba myed pa
211b2('bum): stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rang ba ni/ 
211b3('bum): stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rang
211b4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
211b5('bum): mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde'i zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan/ ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
211b6('bum): spyod pa'i cha/ thabs myi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug sbal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma le spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi po ri med tu/ 
211b7('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ga ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab / 
211b8('bum): po ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mi ma nam la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan
212a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spong ba'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chos tha sa cad stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
212a2('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid bde'i zhes bgyi ba
212a3('bum): slong na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid
212a4('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas / 
212b1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
212b2('bum): myi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod/ 
212b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
212b4('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas chos thams ca da stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

213b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa'a'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces por spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
213b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal / 
214a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan

214a8('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas

214b2('bum): pas dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
214b3('bum): mi mkhas pas dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

214b5('bum): ba'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dpe/ na zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan la/ ngas gal te byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shos
214b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
214b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces brgya bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad de/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
214b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha med tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sa dad// bcom ldan 'das gas te bya
215a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde'i zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das/

215a6('bum): med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gol te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa
215a7('bum): nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ngo bo nyid stong pa

215b1('bum): stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rngos
215b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas
215b3('bum): byas ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi
215b4('bum): mkhas pas dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces pagyi bar spyod na mtshan ma ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
215b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde'i zhes bgyi bar / dan mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
215b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ri mang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dngos pa skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// tso
215b7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi ma khas pas dngos po med par dzin nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod do// 
215b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ralang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dngos po myed pa'ajo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces brgyam
216a1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
216a2('bum): stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dngos
216a3('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
216a4('bum): myimi mkhas pas dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'ang/ sa gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
216a5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
216a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das ga
216a7('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
216a8('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bde'o zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la/ 
216b1('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar
216b2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa ni tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bdag
216b3('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag
216b4('bum): ba rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkha
216b5('bum): pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mam/ na ma le spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
216b6('bum): skrod pa'i cha/ thabs myi mkhas mas dran pa nye bar bzhig pa nas sa ma na zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha ma
216b7('bum): la ma tu mye da pa / rab tugs pa da sa kyi sa srid // ji
217a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa la spyod pa'i ma/ thabs myi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod namacan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas/ 
217a2('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs myi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

217a4('bum): namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yang dag
217a5('bum): par spong ba rnams sdug sngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
217a6('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan
217a7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
217a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda

217b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams bde'i zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de//

218a2('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe

218b7('bum): byan pa la spyod pa'i rdzi/ thabs myi mkhas pas dbang po rnams na nas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shas rab kyi ba

222a1('bum): mi// mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ thams kyi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams mya
222a2('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha'i lang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan nas/ 
222a3('bum): bde'i zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bsam
222a4('bum): gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
222a5('bum): mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
222a6('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan na mas bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sos
222a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pa sla bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
222a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
222b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
222b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas bsam rten rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod
222b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshad myed pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
222b4('bum): la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem das dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshad myed pa rnams
222b5('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen podzi/ sa rab kyi pha rold dutu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
222b6('bum): myi mkhas pas tshad myed pa rnams bde' zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs/ 
222b7('bum): myo mkhas pas tshad myed pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phyi rald tu phyind pa la spyod bIH// 
222b8('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas tshad myed pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
223a1('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas tshad myed pa rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ 
223a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshad myed pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
223a3('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshad myed pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
223a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas tshod myed pa rnams dben zhe das bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
223a5('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas tshad me da pa rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
223a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
223a7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs myed pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar
223a8('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas gzugs myed
223b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bder zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
223b2('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
223b3('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thebs myi mkhas pas gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
223b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs myed pa'i sto mas par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyad na
223b5('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs myed
223b6('bum): pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams zho zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
223b7('bum): thabs mya mkhas myi mkhas pas gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
223b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se/ 
224a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
224a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par thard pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
224a3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par tha ra pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyad na mtshan ma la spyod do/ 
224a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myim/ khas pas rnam par thar pa rnams bde' zhes bgyi bar spyad na/ 
224a5('bum): metshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par thar po
224a6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro song tu byind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs myi mkhas pas
224a7('bum): rnam par tha rad pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ 
224a8('bum): rnam par thar da pa rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
224b1('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par tha rad pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod dri na

224b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par tha rad pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
224b4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par thard pa brgyad myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
224b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi ma// khas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chu/ rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
224b6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi rtag ces
224b7('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas par
224b8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bde'o zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
225a1('bum): myi mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
225a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
225a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan

225a6('bum): myi mkhas pas mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug po dgu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu
225a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
225a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
225b1('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa/ 
225b2('bum): dang / smon pa myed pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi
225b3('bum): pas rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
225b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bde'o zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
225b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i'o tshe/ tha/ bas myi mkhas pas rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang ma
225b6('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
225b7('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems

226a2('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ljin
226a3('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
226a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la s+ho/ dpo'i che/ thabs myi mkhos pas rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben zhes brgya
226a5('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das g.yo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs kyi mkhas pas rnam par
226a6('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
226a7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la smod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mngon por shes pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la skyed do// bcom ldan 'das gape te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
226a8('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs kyi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub

226b4('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams bdag
226b5('bum): myod ces bgyi bar spyad na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lnga// na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya
226b6('bum): mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyo da na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
226b7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
226b8('bum): ro tshod tu phyinang po la spyod pa'i tshe/ thobs myi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
227a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas mngon par shes pa rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom

227a4('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol dad tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ting nge
227a5('bum): 'dzin rnams bde'i zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyodade/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
227a6('bum): thabs myi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ral da tu/ 
227a7('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzind rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas
227a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzind rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
227b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzind rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
227b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzind rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
227b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzind rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gale/ 
227b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ting nge 'dzind rnams myi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
227b5('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spro nga ba'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag/ 
227b6('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas gzungs kyi sgo rnams
227b7('bum): myi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzungs
227b8('bum): kyi sgo rnams bde' zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi ma
228a1('bum): pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
228a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mya mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
228a3('bum): hU~M phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag myed ces bgyi bar spyad na mtshan ma le spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
228a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha ra lang tu phyind pa su spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
