261b3('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rga shi mi bden zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing
261b4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya b.raro mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
261b5('bum): ba sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ba ngag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes
261b6('bum): bya bar mi spyodasbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pharo
261b7('bum): tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
261b8('bum): pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par/ 
262a1('bum): mi spyod de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces
262a2('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
262a3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
262a4('bum): phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
262a5('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spong / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi/ na pa smon pa yid ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims
262a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi bden zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
262a7('bum): mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod
262a8('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spong / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyad/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
262b1('bum): pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes par mi spyod bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod
262b2('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spong / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa tshun ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol
262b3('bum): tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi ben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
262b4('bum): la mi spyod de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar/ 
262b5('bum): mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spong/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces
262b6('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar
262b7('bum): mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi/ 
262b8('bum): spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med
263a1('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / bsam gartan gi pha rol tu phyin
263a2('bum): pa la mi spyod de/ bsam rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod
263a3('bum): bsam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam rtag gi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam rtog gi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam rten gi/ 
263a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam rtag gi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam rten gi/ 
263a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam
263a6('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma mod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam rtag pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sa
263a7('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod po dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
263a8('bum): mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes
263b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcag med ces mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
263b2('bum): pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbed
263b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod
263b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 
263b5('bum): rgyas kyi// bam po/ nang stong pa nyidang la mi spod de/ nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi sprad cing
263b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid po dag ces/ 
263b7('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar me spyod/ nang stong pa nyid kyi zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mi zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar
263b8('bum): mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spong / nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang pa nyid smon pa
264a1('bum): yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / phyi stong
264a2('bum): pabanyid la mi spyod de/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / phyi stong pa nyid rtog ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi sang
264a3('bum): pa nyid sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyodaphyi stong pa nyid mi zhi zhes bya
264a4('bum): bar mi spyod phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi smra dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi snong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma
264a5('bum): myed ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar myi nga/ phyi stong pa nyid dpon zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid ma dben
264a6('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod ning / phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spong
264a7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid sdug sbal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong
264a8('bum): pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes/ bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan
264b1('bum): ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa
264b2('bum): nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
264b3('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong / 
264b4('bum): pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid pa drag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba ra mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa
264b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong / pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyodastong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
264b6('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar myi spod stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong po nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 
264b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la mi spyod do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ na
264b8('bum): stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi sprid/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod
265a1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ chen po
265a2('bum): stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyo dang / chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spod/ chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod
265a3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod / chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod do// 
265a4('bum): don pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / don dam pa stong pa rta/ ga ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag bya par myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bde'o zhes bya bar myi
265a5('bum): spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi smon don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar myi spyod/ don dam pa
265a6('bum): stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ don dam
265a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spod / don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan mo med ces bya bar myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong po nyid smon pa
265a8('bum): med ces bya bar mi spong/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi spong/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ 'dus byas
265b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus
265b2('bum): byas stong pa nyid sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyod 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba/ 
265b3('bum): mi spyoda'adus byas stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan
265b4('bum): ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshon ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa
265b5('bum): med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhe sa bya bar mi spod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dben zhes/ bya bar mi spyod po dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la myi spyod
265b6('bum): de/ 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus mo byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong
265b7('bum): stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag
265b8('bum): myed ces mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spod/ 'dus ma byas
266a1('bum): stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon
266a2('bum): pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes byas par mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / 
266a3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das po stong pa nyid myi
266a4('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi sbed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid snga dag sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag
266a5('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhe sa bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya
266a6('bum): bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ 
266a7('bum): mtha' los 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
266a8('bum): mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang // thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi spyod de/ thog ma dang
266b1('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid
266b2('bum): bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ thog ma drang tha myed pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag
266b3('bum): myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog mo dang tha med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyad/ thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 
266b4('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi skyo dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med
266b5('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang
266b6('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma
266b7('bum): ma la mi spyod cing / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdo zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong
266b8('bum): bunyid su gsul zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong panyid bdag myed ces bya bar mi spyod/ ring ba med po stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar ma gyi
267a1('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid myi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma
267a2('bum): yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa med pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces
267a3('bum): bya bar myi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la myi spyod de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan
267a4('bum): ma la myi spyod cing / rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar myi spong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod// / rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa
267a5('bum): nyid sdug stsol zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces khya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rang /

272b8('bum): ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smos pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod
273a1('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par/ 
273a2('bum): 'jug pa rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la myi spyod de/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam
273a3('bum): par thar pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa pa rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams bdag ces bya bar ma
273a4('bum): bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi spyodarnam par thar pa ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma zhi zhe stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams
273a5('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma/ yid ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam por thar pa rnams smon pa yod
273a6('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / mtha
273a7('bum): kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myi spyod de/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces
273a8('bum): bya bar myi spyod/ mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mthar kyi gnas pa'i smos
273b1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mthar gi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag myed
273b2('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod/ mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mther gyi gnas pa
273b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mthar gi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
273b4('bum): mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces
273b5('bum): bya bar myi spyod/ mthar gi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa myed ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar
273b6('bum): myi dpyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la myi spyod de/ rnam
273b7('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed ma pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rtag ces bya bar myi
273b8('bum): spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa med po mi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed
274a1('bum): pa bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
274a2('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i
274a3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam/ 
274a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myong ba stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myi
274a5('bum): myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyi da dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
274a6('bum): ba nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar mi spyod// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa smon pa yod ces
274a7('bum): bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar bu'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa smon pa myed ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
274a8('bum): myed pa dang / smon pa med pa dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa mi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / mngon par
274b1('bum): shes pa rnams la myi spyod de/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la spyod cing / mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi rtag ces bya ba/ 
274b2('bum): mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ 
274b3('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnas
274b4('bum): stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar myi dpyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma mye yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ mngon par
274b5('bum): shes pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ ma na byar shes pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar
274b6('bum): spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la myi spyod de/ ting nge 'dzin
274b7('bum): rnams kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing / ting nge 'dzin rnams rtog ces bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ 
274b8('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug sngol zhes bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
275a1('bum): ni zhes bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mya spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge
275a2('bum): 'dzin rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan mo myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnamaso smon pa yod ces bya bar myi spod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa myed/ 
275a3('bum): myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya bar myi spro dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod de/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
275a4('bum): kyi mtshan ma la myi spyad cing / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba dar mi spyod/ gzugs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spong / 
275a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnam so bdag myed ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhen
275a6('bum): bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa zhes bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan
275a7('bum): ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa med ces bya bar myi spyod
275a8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya bar myi spong/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi spyod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
275b1('bum): rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
275b2('bum): stobs rnams bde zhes bya bar myi dpyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
275b3('bum): stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar myi dpyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs
275b4('bum): rnams steng zhes bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs na mas mi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobasra rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
275b5('bum): pa'i stobs rnams mtshan mo myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin// gshegs pa'i stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar myi// spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams smon pa med
275b6('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dpon zhes bya bar myi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
275b7('bum): rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams la myi spyod de/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ myi 'jigs pa
275b8('bum): rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sdug sngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ mi 'jin
276a1('bum): pa rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ myi 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ myi 'jigs pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar myi stong
276a2('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ myi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ myi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa yod
276a3('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod/ myi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ myi 'jigs pa rnams dpon zhes bya bar myi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa dang / so so ya
276a4('bum): dag par rig pa rnams la myi spyod de/ so so yang dag par rig po rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / so so yang dge ba dar rig pa rnams rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ yang dag par rig
276a5('bum): pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ so so yang dag par ri ga pa rnams bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ so so yang
276a6('bum): dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar myi spyad// so so yang dag
276a7('bum): par rig pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi stong zhes bya bar myi dpyad/ so so yang dag
276a8('bum): par rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar myi sbed
276b1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar myi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya bar myi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi dben zhes bya bar myi spyod pa/ 
276b2('bum): dang / snying rje chen po la myi spyod de/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan mo la myi spyod cing / snying rje chen po rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ snying rje chen po rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ snying rje chen po rtag ces bya bar/ 
276b3('bum): mi spyod/ snying rje chen po bde zhes bya bar myi spyod/ snying rje chen po sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ snying rje chen po bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ snying rje chen po bdag myong ces bya bar myi spyod snying rje chen po
276b4('bum): zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ snying rje chen po mi zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ snying rje chen po myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya bar
276b5('bum): myi spyod/ snying rje chen po mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ snong rje chen po smon pa yod ces bya b.raro myi spyod/ snying rje chen po smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po dben zhes
276b6('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod/ snying rje chen po myi dben zhes bya b.raro myi spyong pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la myi spyod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco'i rgyad kyi mtshan ma la myi spyod cing
276b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco'i brgyad rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco' rgyad myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco' brgyad bde zhes bya bar myi spyod
276b8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco' brgyad sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco' brgyad bdag ces bya bar myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco'i rgyad bdag cis
277a1('bum): bya bar myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco'i rgyad zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco' brgyud ma zhi zhes bya bar myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
277a2('bum): ma 'dres pa bco'i brgyad stong zhes bya bar mi spyod// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco' brgyad myi stong zhes bya bar myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco'i brgyad mtshan ma yod ces
277a3('bum): bya bar myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa bco' brgyad smon pa yod ces bya bar myi spyod/ sangs rgyas
277a4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco' brgyad smon pa myed ces bya bar myi spyod/ sangs rgyas ma 'dres pa bco' brgyad dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco' brgyad mi dben
277a5('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' / mas dpa' chen chen po thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ 
277a6('bum): bam po/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyi gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gung
277a7('bum): na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang tshor ba ma yin
277a8('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na yang tshor ba myed/ tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du shes
277b1('bum): ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang 'du shes myed/ 'du shes las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang kyang 'du shes/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'du byed kyi stong
277b2('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'du byed ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed/ 'du byed las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid
277b3('bum): do/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa myed/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med
277b4('bum): de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ myig gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang myig myig ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na myig
277b5('bum): myed/ myig las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang myig/ myig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rna ba'i steng ba nyid gang yin pa de yang rna ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
277b6('bum): gud na yang rna ba myed/ rna ba las gang na yang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba nyid/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sna'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sna'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de
277b7('bum): yang sna ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na sna myed/ sna las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lce'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang lce ma yin
277b8('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na yang lce myed/ lce las gud ni yang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lus kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang lus ma yin/ stong
278a1('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na yang lus myed/ lus las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang yid me
278a2('bum): yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang yid myed/ yid las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid las kyang yid/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang
278a3('bum): gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs myed/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sgra
278a4('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sgra ma yin pa de yang sgra ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sgra myed/ sgra las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang sgra/ sgra nyid
278a5('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dri'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / dri ma yin// stong pa nyid las gud na yang dri myed/ dri/ las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang / 
278a6('bum): dri/ dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ro'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang ro ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang ro myed/ rolas gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de// stong po nyid kyang ro// ro nyid kyang
278a7('bum): stong pa nyid do// reg gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang reg ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang reg las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed/ stong pa nyid kyang
278a8('bum): rig/ reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// chos kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang chos ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos med/ chos las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chos
278b1('bum): chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// myig gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang myig gi khams ma yin// myig gi kham stong pa nyid las gud na yang myig gi khas myed/ sdig gi kham
278b2('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang myig gi khams/ myig gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzugs kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs kyi khams ma
278b3('bum): yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs kyi khams myed de/ gzugs kyi khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs kyi khams/ gzugs kyi khams nyid
278b4('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ste dang pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang myig gi
278b5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams myed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong / pa nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ myig/

284a8('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do/ stobs lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang stobs rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang stobs rnams myed/ stobs rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid de/ stong
284b1('bum): pa nyid kyang stobs/ stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang byang chub kyi yan lag
284b2('bum): rnams myed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid gang
284b3('bum): yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na yang
284b4('bum): nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yi
284b5('bum): pa de'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed/ stong pa nyid las gu med na yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed/ 'phags kha 'i bden pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ 
284b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bdon pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bsam gtan bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yinapa de yang bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid/ 
284b7('bum): las gud na yang bsam gtan rnams myed/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshad myed pa bzhi'i smo/ 
284b8('bum): pa nyid gang yin de yang tshad myed pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang tshad myed pa rnams myed/ tshad myed pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshad myed pa/ tshang/ 
285a1('bum): myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mya yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na
285a2('bum): yang gzugs myed pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams myed dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams lasu gud na yang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
285a3('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par thar pa
285a4('bum): rnams myed/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa/ rnam par thar pa sto/ rang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par
285a5('bum): 'jug pa rgu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mthar kyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid la sa gud na yang mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
285a6('bum): rnams myed/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang mthar kyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i
285a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam mthar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
285a8('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
285b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa/ rnam par
285b2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mngon par shes pa drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ stong
285b3('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang mngon par shes pa rnams myed/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa/ mngon par shes pa nyid
285b4('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin/ pa de yang ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gu de na yang ting nge 'dzin rnams myed/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las/ 
285b5('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzi na/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzungs kyi sgo ci rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams
285b6('bum): ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid myong stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo gzungs kyi
285b7('bum): sgo nad kyang stong pa nyid do/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i stong pa nyid gang min pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid la sku gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ 
285b8('bum): stobs rnams myed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs/ de bzhin gsheg rjes pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid/ 
286a1('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang myi 'jigs pa rnams myed/ myi 'jigs pa rnams lus gud na yang stong pa nyid myed
286a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa/ myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang
286a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 
286a4('bum): byams pa chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang byams pa chen po ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang byams pa chen po myed/ byams pa chen po las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen
286a5('bum): pobyams pa chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// snying rje chen po de'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid gang / yin pa de yang snying rje chen po ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang snying
286a6('bum): rje chen po myed/ snying rje chen po las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco' brgyad kyi stong
286a7('bum): nyid gang yin pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las
286a8('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang
286b1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin// stong pa nyid las gud na yang thams cad shes pa nyid myed/ thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid myed/ stong pa nyid las kyang thams cad shes pa nyid tho/ 
286b2('bum): cad shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed de/ lam
286b3('bum): gi rnam par shes pa nyid myed de/ stong pa nyid kyang lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid/ lam gi rnam pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam pa thams cad
286b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid lngas gud na yang stong pa nyid myed de stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams ca
286b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la spyod pa ni/ bla na myed pa thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha
286b6('bum): ro dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ska'o/ 
286b7('bum): pa yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyigaso/ myi spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyig so// myi spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyig
286b8('bum): so// spyod kyang spyod la myi spyod kyang spyod la myi spyod kyang myi spyod kyang myi spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyig so// spyod pa yang ma yin myi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar myi dmyig so// shi ri'i bus smos
287a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod ces su bya bar myi dmyigs/ myi spyod ces bya bar
287a2('bum): yang myi dmyigs/ spyod kyang spyod la/ myi spyod kyang myi spyod do zhes bya bar myi dmyigs te/ spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar myi dmyigs sode/ rab 'byor kyis smos pa/ tshe dang ldan
287a3('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs pa'i phyir te// de ci'i phyir zhe no// 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po myed pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshe dang
287a4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyo dad pa'i tshe/ spyod do zhes bya bar yang myi dmyigaso/ mi spyod do zhes bya bar
287a5('bum): yang myi dmyigs so// spyod kyang spyod la/ myi spyod kyang myi te spyod do zhes bya bar yang myi dmyigaso// spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar myi dmyigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
287a6('bum): 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i rang gzhin du khong du chud de/ ma blangs pa'i phyir ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems zhum pa
287a7('bum): myed cing yongs su zhum pa myed de/ myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye
287a8('bum): par gyur par shes par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
287b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba zhes bya ba ste/ rgya che ba mchog tu bya ba tshad myed par nges pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis myi 'phrogs pa ste/ ting nge
287b2('bum): 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorang ting nge 'dzin 'di
287b3('bum): 'ba' shig gis rnam par spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 'tshang rgya'am/ 'on te de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
287b4('bum): gzhan dag kyang yod/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa// tshe dang / ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la rnam par spyad pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na
287b5('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog/ sa par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yod do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i/ byang chub
287b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
287b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba med de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
287b8('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla/ 
288a1('bum): ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
288a2('bum): dpa' chen po myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sos
288a3('bum): dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub ses
288a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog gas pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// chos thams ca dad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge
288a5('bum): 'dzin des rnam par spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos thams cad kyi phyag
288a6('bum): rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
288a7('bum): rgya'o// spyi myug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
288a8('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na myed pa la/ 
288b1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
288b2('bum): myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
288b3('bum): myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// chos thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
288b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting
288b5('bum): 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// myur du bla myed pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma ngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes byaste/ 
288b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par dpyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// dpung rnam
288b7('bum): par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par/ 
288b8('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// yang dag 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang/ 
289a1('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
289a2('bum): chen po/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin des rnam
289a3('bum): par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
289a4('bum): yod do/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dadapa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// nyam
289a5('bum): ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin des na ma par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
289a6('bum): par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
289a7('bum): po/ myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// nam mkha' rgyas par 'gyengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod
289a8('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rdo rje dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// 
289b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rgyal mtshan gi rtse mo'i
289b2('bum): dbang rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs/ 
289b3('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o// dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog
289b4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rgyun kyi rjesu song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
289b5('bum): myur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu na// ngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// seng ge rnam par bsgyid sa po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam
289b6('bum): par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pomyur tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu me ngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// snrel gzhi zhes bya ba'i
289b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur tu bla na myedang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
289b8('bum): rgya'o// nyon mongs pa spang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rjod
290a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
