316a7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
316a8('bum): pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhini stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa
316b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma ya na no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nang stong pa nyid dang / 
316b2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
316b3('bum): pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / 
316b4('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mi 'jigs pa bzhi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid
316b5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po sto/ pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong
316b6('bum): nyid dang // thog ma dang tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid dang / der bskyed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang ba'ini stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshon nying stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong ba nyid
316b7('bum): sa kyi sbyong ba snong pa da / ngo nyid stong ba nyid dang / dngos po stong pa 'dzin nyi slong sa nyid kyi phyir yang ba ma badzin/ shar drin chumam yang dag par rig pa ban nang stong bkod dado// bya zla da/ 
316b8('bum): byinang spong ba nyid dang / spong pa nyid thong ba nyid dang / zid pa stong banyid dang / dod dam po stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas spong ba 'di dang / 'dus ma byas spong ba zhing dang / mtha' mas 'das pa srung po nyid dang / khyod/ 
317a1('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid / 
317a2('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong
317a3('bum): nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed/ 
317a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong/ pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan// nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
317a5('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nang stong pa nyid dang / 
317a6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
317a7('bum): stong ba nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa 'ad dang / dor bamed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhini stong pa nyid dang / rgyas thams cad stong de nyid dang / rang po mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang myigs pa srung
317a8('bum): nyid dang / dngos pa med pa stong ba nyid dang / tho nyidi spang ba nyid dang / dngas po myed pa'i jo ga nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yad pa ma yin no// de la byis pa se mar skye ba rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas sring sa
317b1('bum): mngon par zhen te// de dag gis myed pa la yongasu brtags pas/ myed pa la mngon par zhen cing 'di lta ste/ chad pa dang rtag pa'i mtha' la chags pas de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ gang med pa'i chos de dag/ 
317b2('bum): yongs su brtags pas/ mying dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag/ sbyin pa'i pha ralod tu phyind pa la mngon par zhen to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la mngon par zhen to// bzod pa'i pha rol
317b3('bum): tu phyind pa la mngon par zhen to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la mngon par zhen to// bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la mngon par zhen to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par zhen/ 
317b4('bum): to// nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// phyi stong pa nyid la mdo na par zhen to// phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// chen po stong pa nyid la mngon pa
317b5('bum): zhen to// don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// 'dus byas so// pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la/ mngon par zhen to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par
317b6('bum): zhin te/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par zhen to/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par me na/ 
317b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyidadi stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par led no// dngos po myed pa stong pa 'di la mngon par zhen to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par nan te/ dngos po myed pa'i
317b8('bum): di byung bzhid la mang na pa na tsa/ dran banye par gnog pa rnams la mngon par 'an to// yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par zhen to/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen te/ dbang po rnams kyi
318a1('bum): mngon par zhen to// stobs rnams la mngon par zhen to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par zhen to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhen to// 'phags pa'i bden pa
318a2('bum): rnams la mngon par zhen te/ bsam gtan rnams la mngon par zhen to// tshad med pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// rnam par thard pa rnams
318a3('bum): la mngon par zhen to// mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mngon par zhen to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen to// mngon par
318a4('bum): shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// ting nge 'dzin rnams la/ mngon par zhen to// gzungs gi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par zhen tan myi
318a5('bum): 'jigs pa rnams pa mngon par nin to/ sa sa yang dag ga pa rnams la mngon par na tu/ 'i rje chen po la ma zhin to/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon pa mno / 
318a6('bum): de na de dag dri ma par rten pas yod tha ma pani pa'ichos rnams mangs te/ de dag mi shes mi mthong // ma gis mimamyong zhe na/ gzugs mi nas mi mthong rnyen/ tshor pa mi shes mi mthong / 
318a7('bum): skyeshes mi mthong ngo // 'du byed myi shes myi mthong ngo po/ rnam par shes pa ma zhes mi mthong ngo // mig mi shes mi mthong // rngub myi shes myi mdzang / sna mi shes mi mthong / e mi shes mi mthadzo / sus
318a8('bum): mi mthong ba/ ming mi gos ma ma mngad gzugs mishes mi mthong ngo // mi shes mi mtho dri mi gas mi mo dzad rtse ma shes mo mthodzang/ rig ma zhes mi mthong / tsam ma shes mi mamang mig gi rna
318b1('bum): par shes pa myi shes myi mthong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi mthong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes mi mthong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / yid kyi
318b2('bum): rnam par shes pa mi shes myi mthong ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi shes mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi shes mi mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes myi mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi shes myi
318b3('bum): mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi shes myi mthong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi shes myi mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor/ 
318b4('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bamyi shes mi mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshorami shes mi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
318b5('bum): ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis rje ra ba myi shes myi mthong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinid pa mi she sa myi mthong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa shes mi mdzeg
318b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi shes mi mthong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa myi shes mi mthong ngo // bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyini pa myi
318b7('bum): shes myi mthong ngo // nang stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid mi shes mi tshon
318b8('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid mi ma shes myi mthong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi shes myi mthong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // thog ma dang
319a1('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi shes myi mthong nga/ dong ba myed pa spyod pa mi shes mi mthong du// rlung ba ni snang ba da mi shes mi mangs chos thams cad stong ba nyid mi shes ma mamangag / 
319a2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi mthong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi shes myi mthong ngo // dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
319a3('bum): stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // yang dag par spang ba bzhi ni mi shes mi mthong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // dbang po lnga mi shes mi mthong
319a4('bum): stobs lnga mi shes mi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi sa myi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // bsam gtan rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshad
319a5('bum): med pa rnams mi shes mi mthong / gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa ra 'jug pa rnams mi shes myi mthong ngo // rnam par thar da pa pa rgyad mi shes mi mthong ngo // mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa
319a6('bum): 'jug pa dgu mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par thar pa'i sde stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi shes mi mthong ba/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // ting nge 'dzin nam sa mi gyi
319a7('bum): mi mthong ngo // gzungs gi sgo rnams mi shes mi mthong / snying rje chen po mi shes mi mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi shes mi mthong ngo / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi ma shes mi mthong ngo / mos
319a8('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi shes mi mthong / de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'dongo ba ste/ de dag ni 'byung ba ma yin no// gang nas
319b1('bum): 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe no// gzugs gi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// nyan thos kyi sa las 'byung ba yin/ 
319b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag yid mi ches pa ste/ ji ltar yid mi ches zhe na/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// tshor ba tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches
319b3('bum): 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi cheso// rnam par tha da shes pa rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mag mig gis
319b4('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches// rna ba rna bas stong zhes bya bar yi/ da mi ches so// sna snas stong zhes bya bar yid mi che so// lce lces stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus lus kyis stong zhes bya ba
319b5('bum): yid mchis so// yid yid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// gzugs gzugs gas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sgra sgras stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dri dris stong zhes bya
319b6('bum): bar yid mi ches// ro ros stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// reg reg gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// chos chos kyis stong zhes bya b.ro yid mi ches so// mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par nos
319b7('bum): pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna'i rnam par shes pa lnga'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi cheso// 
319b8('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus gi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi
320a1('bum): rnam par shes pas steng zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas sto
320a2('bum): zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus kyi lun
320a3('bum): te rig pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mi
320a4('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor 'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ zhes yid mi ches so// 
320a5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i// rkyen kyis tshor rabs stong zhes bya bar yid mi che so/ lce'i 'du/ sa te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
320a6('bum): kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus kyi 'dus te re ga pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tsher bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
320a7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi chis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyini pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches/ chubo khrims kyi
320a8('bum): rol tu phyini pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yod mi ches so// brtson 'grus kyi pha ral
320b1('bum): tu phyind pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nid pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyinid pa bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pas stong zhes bya bar mi ches so// shes rab kyi pha rol
320b2('bum): tu phyind pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches
320b3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya/ 
320b4('bum): yid mi ches so// don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi das stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'du ngas byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'dus
320b5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya ba yid mi ches so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' la/ sa 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// / 
320b6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rang bzhin/ 
320b7('bum): stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi man
320b8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong/ 
321a1('bum): zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes
321a2('bum): bya bar yid mi chis so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi chis so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// / 
321a3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dbang po lnga dbang po rnams gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// stobs lnga stobs rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 
321a4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong nye sa bya bar yid mi ches so// bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// tshad med pa rnams tshad
321a5('bum): myed pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// gzugs mye/ da po'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa/ par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi che so/ rnam par
321a6('bum): tha ra pa brgyad rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi chos so// mthar dgas gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtha rang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus skyong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 
321a7('bum): rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi chis/ mngon par shes pa rnams
321a8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi che so// gzungs gi sgo rnams gzungs gi sgo rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches
321b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus skyong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi 'jigs pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// so so yang dag par rigs/ 
321b2('bum): bzhi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong zhes bya bar yid myi ches so// sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras
321b3('bum): pa bco brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bru
321b4('bum): bus stong zhes bya bar mi che so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid myi
321b5('bum): ches so// rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar myi che/ sa so// lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid lam gi rnam par shes nyid kyi rnapas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
321b6('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi chis so// de dag ni gnas pa ma yin te/ ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhes bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phye nid pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha
321b7('bum): rol tu phyinid pa la gnas pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rolong tu phyinid pa la gnas pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la gnas pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa yin
321b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la gnas pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa yin/ 
322a1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'as/ 
322a2('bum): papa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ chos thams cad s+ho// 
322a3('bum): pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid sto
322a4('bum): pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la gnas/ ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas pa ma
322a5('bum): yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ rdzu n+da/ la gi rkang pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams gnas pa ma yin/ stobs rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ 
322a6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas pa yi
322a7('bum): tshad med pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ rnam par tha ra pa brgyad la gnas pa ma yin/ mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ 
322a8('bum): dgu la gnas pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la gnas pa la gnam yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gdu
322b1('bum): pa ma yin/ gzugs gi sgo rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas pa ma yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas pa yin/ 
322b2('bum): byams pa chen po la gnas pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po la gnas pa me yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rnams la gnas pa ma yin no// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ji ltar mngon par zhen pa
322b3('bum): yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'du shes la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'du byed la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ myig
322b4('bum): la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna la/ mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid la mngon par zhen pa yin
322b5('bum): gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sgra la mngon par zhen pa yin dri la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ro la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos la mngon par zhen pa
322b6('bum): yin/ myig gi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzugs gi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba'i khams la mngon par zhen
322b7('bum): pa yin/ sgra'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dra'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin
322b8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ro'o khams yi mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhed pa na
323a1('bum): lus kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg bya'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par len pa yin/ yid gi khams la mngon par zhe pa yin/ 
323a2('bum): chos kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags la mngon par zhen pa yin/ zhe sdang la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gti mug la mngon par
323a3('bum): zhen pa yin/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ma rig pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'du byed la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par
323a4('bum): ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye mched drug la ma dngon par zhen pa yin/ reg pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor dab la mngon par zhen pa yini/ sred pa la mngon par zhen pa yin
323a5('bum): len pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ srid pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rga shi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinid pa la mngon par zhenapa
323a6('bum): yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinid pa la mngon par zhen pa yanI/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bas rten
323a7('bum): gi pha rol tu phyinid pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nid pa la mngon por zhen pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyi nang
323a8('bum): stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa ya ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la
323b1('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen po yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ngo / 
323b2('bum): ba myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 
323b3('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par
323b4('bum): zhen pa ya ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par zhen pa yi don/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa ya ni// 
323b5('bum): dbang po rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ stobs rnams la ma ngon par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mdo/ na par zhen pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
323b6('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshad mod pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
323b7('bum): 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
323b8('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzungs gi sgo rnams la mngon par zhenas/ 
324a1('bum): yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs bcu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yani/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byas pa chen
324a2('bum): po la mngon par zhen pa yin/ snying rje chen po la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yani/ 
324a3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin/ le gi/ 
324a4('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yini/ rnam pa thams cad ma ko/ khyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bla na med pa yang da/ dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ 
324a5('bum): de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar sgo ba pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la myi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad
324a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du myi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi slob pa
324a7('bum): yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi slob pa lags/ rnam pa
324a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
324b1('bum): byind pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyinid pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu/ 
324b2('bum): phyind pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ nang stong pa nyid la brtags ni/ 
324b3('bum): mngon par zhen/ phyi stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par mkhyen/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtags la shing mngon par zhen/ chen po stong pa nyid la brtag/ 
324b4('bum): shing mngon par zhe na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon pad zhe na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 
324b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thog/ ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 
324b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la
324b7('bum): brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid la brtags ni
324b8('bum): mngon par zhen/ dran panye bar gzhan pa rnams samartags shing mngon par nen/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rdzu 'phrul gi nang ba rnams yi brtags shing mang
325a1('bum): dbang po rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stobs rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags// 
325a2('bum): shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bsam gtan rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ tshad med pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ gzugs med pa'i snyos
325a3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam par thar
325a4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la baHdgus shing mngon par zhen/ mngon par shes pa rnams la badz+ra/ gas shing mngon par zhen/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtags shing
325a5('bum): mngon par zhen/ gzungs gi sgo rnams la brtags shing mngon par/ zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhe/ 
325a6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ snying rje chen po la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thams cad shes pa
325a7('bum): nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/ ga ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 
325a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du myi 'byung ba yin no// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ 
325b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rnam pa gang gis slob pa lags/ ji ltar na bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkaSha
325b2('bum): stsal pa// sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa
325b3('bum): tati'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gso 'byung ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
325b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyodapa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gi pha rolod tu phyin pa de myi dmyags shing yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
325b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la de ltar slob bo// ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
325b6('bum): chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
325b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
325b8('bum): tshe// bzod pa'i pha ral tu phyin pa de/ myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ra long tu phyi ning pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs
326a1('bum): pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol/ 
326a2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i
326a3('bum): tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha ralod tu phyinid pa de myi dmyigs
326a4('bum): shing yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de da ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad
326a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // / bam po// / sha ra dwa ta'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
326a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinang
326a7('bum): pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi stong po nyid
326a8('bum): de myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rjesu myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams
326b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste// sha ra pA
326b2('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
326b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
326b4('bum): po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyags pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // da ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chen po
326b5('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing // yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sem/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
326b6('bum): pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
326b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i/ 
326b8('bum): tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing / yang das/ 
327a1('bum): par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
327a2('bum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwatini
327a3('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa
327a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyo/ dpa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de/ myi dmyigs shi dang yang dag par rjesu myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
327a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
327a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems pa
327a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
327a8('bum): chen po/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
327b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rang bzhini stong pa nyid la spyod ci'i
327b2('bum): che/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyig
327b3('bum): pa'i tshul gas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de myi
327b4('bum): dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gri
327b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rang gi mtshan nyi/ de stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs
327b6('bum): shang / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thas
327b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su myi
327b8('bum): mthong ste/ shar dwa ti bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar sleb po ni/ myi dmyigs po'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'ang du 'bru'o// 
328a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngoso po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste/ sha
328a2('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha re dwa ti'i bu byang chub
328a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
328a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyig sa pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dngos
328a5('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/ myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
328a6('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ni
328a7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
328a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la
328b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rjesu mya mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa/ 
328b2('bum): ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang bde
328b3('bum): dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod slob pa ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas
328b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa to'o bu/ dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang pos rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag pa
328b5('bum): rje su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' se/ sa dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la de ltaraslob pa ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
328b6('bum): nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag por rjesu myi mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub
328b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slong pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' se
328b8('bum): dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' kyi yan log rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rjesu myi mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
329a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
329a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
329a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
329a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la/ spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rdza su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
329a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyining/ pa la de ltar slob pa ni// myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
329a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
329a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmigs pa'i tshul gros/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
329a8('bum): dpa' chen po/ tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyis/ 
329b1('bum): rarolod tu phyinid pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs myed pa'i
329b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sem
329b3('bum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
329b4('bum): chen po/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par datha rad pa de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su mi mtho to/ ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
329b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni myi dmyig sa pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
329b6('bum): mtha rad gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
329b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ de ltar slob pa ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa
329b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa de dag myi dmyig/ 
330a1('bum): shing yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams/ 
330a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rjesu mi mthog
330a3('bum): ste// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byungang
330a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin de dag myi dmyi gas shing / yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i
330a5('bum): bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung // sha ra dwa
330a6('bum): ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzungs gi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs gi sgo de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ri'i bu/ byang chub sems
330a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha yod tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung / sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
330a8('bum): dpa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sem/ 
330b1('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la de ltar slob pa ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
330b2('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
330b3('bum): pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa'i
330b4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar
330b5('bum): slob pa ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sa/ mas dpa' chen po/ snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje
330b6('bum): chen po de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i
330b7('bum): tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
330b8('bum): de dag myi dmyigs shing / yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnams
331a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung // sha ra Sha dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid de dag myi dmyigs shing yang dag pa
331a2('bum): rje su myi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // 
331a3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gri rnam par shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu bya
331a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar slob pa ni/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa
331a5('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de myi dmyigs shing yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste// 
331a6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar slob pa ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i chu
331a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas/ rnam pa thas
331a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa
331b1('bum): nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmyigs pa'i tshul kis dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi
331b2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa
331b3('bum): stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 
331b4('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan de nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa ste dang pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong
331b5('bum): pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med 'i sto ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi gyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
331b6('bum): 'byung bar shes par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri 'di ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyis 'tshod
331b7('bum): tu byanid pa la bslabs shing / rnam thathams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba des ji skad du
331b8('bum): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhigi 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gi phar mong tu phyid pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram rnaMm
332a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di brtsod/ 
332a2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de/ 
332a3('bum): la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyini pe la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ 
332a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bya dgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes
332a5('bum): bu 'di tshul khrims kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom
332a6('bum): ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji ltar bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
332a7('bum): bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes
332a8('bum): bu 'di nang stong pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bska
332b1('bum): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhag 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di phyi stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par/ 
332b2('bum): 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad
332b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mtshan/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig sgyu mo'i skyes
